hero.badge: <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M12 22s8-4 8-10V5l-8-3-8 3v7c0 6 8 10 8 10z"/></svg> Free app — Windows, macOS, Linux
hero.title: Your eyes, spine and mind will thank you
hero.subtitle: Smart breaks, hydration reminders, eye exercises and activity tracking — all in one lightweight app that runs in the background.
feat.title: What does HealthDesk do?
feat.subtitle: Key features + more — everything you need for healthy computer work.
feat.breaks.d: 4 work methods to choose from: Pomodoro, 20-20-20, 52-17 and 90-minute. Smart break protection — reminders never overlap.
feat.water.d: Goal: 8 glasses a day. Gentle reminders every 30 minutes. Track progress and build a habit.
feat.eyes.d: Guided sessions with a timer. Eye movements, blinking, focus changes — reduce eye strain.
feat.track.d: Automatic app categorization into work, entertainment, communication and learning.
feat.audio.d: Brown noise, rain, forest, ocean — generated in real time.
feat.radio.d: 6 YT stations + 6 FM stations (RMF, Antyradio, ZET, Eska). Pause stops music together with timers.
feat.breath.d: Box breathing 4-4-4-4 with an animated circle. Reduce stress in 60 seconds.
feat.stretch.d: Guided exercises for neck, shoulders and back — step by step with a timer.
feat.idle.d: Detects inactivity and Focus Assist. Timers freeze when you step away. Zero popups when Windows DND is active.
preview.title: See how it looks
preview.subtitle: Dark, elegant interface that doesn't distract — delivers information at a glance.
how.title: How does it work?
how.subtitle: Three simple steps to healthier computer work.
how.s1.d: Download the installer, click next and you're done. No account, no sign-up.
how.s2.d: HealthDesk runs in the background. You won't notice it until it's time for a break.
how.s3.d: Respond to reminders. Your eyes and spine will thank you.
why.title: Why is it worth it?
why.subtitle: Habits backed by scientific research.
why.s1.d: Short breaks every 25–52 minutes increase productivity by 13% and reduce mental fatigue.
why.s2.d: Regular hydration improves focus and reduces headaches.
why.s3.d: Short movement breaks prevent back pain and improve circulation.
why.s3.src: Source: WHO Guidelines on Physical Activity (2020)
cmp.title: How does HealthDesk compare?
cmp.subtitle: Honest comparison with popular alternatives.
cmp.footer: Data based on versions available in February 2026. Size and RAM may vary by platform.
cta.title: Ready for healthier work?
cta.subtitle: Install for free and start taking care of yourself — from the very first break.
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes, completely free. No hidden fees, subscriptions or premium. All features available right away.
faq.q2: Does the app collect my data?
faq.a2: Statistics, breaks and hydration are stored locally on your computer. The app sends anonymous telemetry (installation UUID, usage events, system version) to improve the product. You can disable this in Settings > System > Anonymous telemetry. We do not collect any personal data.
faq.a3: Yes — breaks, exercises, water, activity and sounds work offline. Only YouTube Radio requires internet.
faq.a4: Yes. Choose a preset work method (Pomodoro, 20-20-20, 52-17, 90-minute) or set custom intervals. Break frequency, water reminders, work hours — all configurable in settings.
faq.q5: How do I uninstall the app?
faq.q7: Windows shows a blue screen during installation?
modal.title: Before installing
modal.subtitle: The app is safe and open source. Your system may require an extra step.
mock.break_desc:
Look away from the screen and focus
on an object about 6 meters away.
